author: Timothy Rapp
title: Phillies' Bryce Harper Donates $500K to Las Vegas, Philadelphia COVID-19 Relief
description: Philadelphia Phillies  superstar  Bryce Harper  announced Thursday that he would be donating $500,000 in total to three foundations—the Direct Relief and Three Square foundations ...
content:
Carlos Osorio/Associated Press
Philadelphia Phillies superstar Bryce Harper announced Thursday that he would be donating $500,000 in total to three foundationsthe Direct Relief and Three Square foundations in Las Vegas and the Philabundance foundation in Phi… [+637 chars]
